sn35.43-51:4.4: And what is the all that is impermanent?
sn35.43-51:4.5: The eye, sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact are impermanent.
sn35.43-51:4.6: And the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact is also impermanent.
sn35.43-51:4.10: The mind, phenomena, mind consciousness, and mind contact are impermanent.
sn35.43-51:4.11: The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact is also impermanent.
sn35.43-51:4.12: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned …
sn35.43-51:4.18: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual life has been lived, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
sn35.43-51:10.1: “Mendicants, all is to be directly known. …”
sn35.43-51:12.1: “Mendicants, all is to be completely understood. …”
sn35.43-51:14.1: “Mendicants, all is to be given up. …”
sn35.43-51:18.1: “Mendicants, all is to be directly known and completely understood. …”
